body_html:
hello!
i met the same question during the training of speech recognition.

OS Platform : ubuntu 16.04

TensorFlow installed from pip

TensorFlow version 1.6

here is my label format of the speech:

utterance_id dialect_id

20170809_zj L

when i ran the training code ,the errors occurred:Labels length is zero in batch 0(here batch = 10)
what confused me is that the length of the label is 1 ,not 0.why the error happens?
or where did i mistaken?
Thank you!

body:
hello!
i met the same question during the training of speech recognition.

> OS Platform : ubuntu 16.04

> TensorFlow installed from pip

> TensorFlow version 1.6

here is my label format of the speech:

> utterance_id dialect_id

> 20170809_zj L

when i ran the training code ,the errors occurred:**Labels length is zero in batch 0**(here batch = 10)
what confused me is that the length of the label is 1 ,not 0.why the error happens?
or where did i mistaken?
Thank you!
